The current version of this module is no longer available in SymconMisc.
The current version can be found in the Module Store, available since version 5.1.
 Alternatively you can install it via Module Control: https://github.com/symcon/Watchdog
Time until not updatet objects will set off an alert. Its added to the last time an object is updatet.
Interval which checks the linked objects
